text:
Hello everyone.
Would appreciate any help on the following matter.
I'm currently building a POC for and API that should help us to build an integration between one of our internal systems and HubSpot.
The problem that I've faced, is that I can't find any documentation on production ready Machine to Machine authentication approach in HubSpot.
ApiKey doesn't look safe enough and OAuth approach requires user interaction.
If anyone else faced a similar challenge and/or can give any input on the problem - I would really appreciate it.

Thanks in advance

hi everyone,

I am using Marketing Event API to create an Event using API (`POST /marketing/v3/marketing-events-beta/events`), the event created successfully.
And then use API `POST /marketing/v3/marketing-events-beta/events/{externalEventId}/{subscriberState}/email-upsert`  to register an event for my contact and get response code `202 Accepted` but I did not see it in my contacts and also did not see the registrants for my event.

I really appreciate if someone show me the issue.

Thanks

Hi everyone,
I got a HubSpot account and I am able to login to the dashboard. But where can I find the HubSpot key in order to call API?
Does anyone know the accounts relationship? I have a few normal portal accounts and also has a few developer accounts. How does developer account link to portal account?
